allow: Bash(cmd.exe /c "echo -- Drop existing FK > fix_fk_constraint.py && echo ALTER TABLE locations DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS locations_user_id_fkey; >> fix_fk_constraint.py && echo -- Create new FK to users.user_id instead of users.id >> fix_fk_constraint.py && echo ALTER TABLE locations ADD CONSTRAINT locations_user_id_fkey FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES users(user_id) ON DELETE CASCADE; >> fix_fk_constraint.py")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "findstr /i "role permission user" database-setup.sql | findstr /i "CREATE TABLE"")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "findstr /n /c:""public async Task UpdateAsync(long id, Domain.Entities.User user)"" Convoy.Service\Services\UserService.cs")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "set PGPASSWORD=GarantDockerPass && psql -h 10.21.61.51 -p 5432 -U postgres -d convoydb -c "d users"")

Bash(cmd.exe /c "set PGPASSWORD=GarantDockerPass&& psql -h 10.21.61.51 -p 5432 -U postgres -d convoydb -c ""SELECT column_name, data_type, character_maximum_length FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_name = ''users'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;""")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "set PGPASSWORD=GarantDockerPass&& psql -h 10.21.61.51 -p 5432 -U postgres -d convoydb -f fix-location-fk-constraint.sql")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "set PGPASSWORD=GarantDockerPass && psql -h 10.21.61.51 -p 5432 -U postgres -d convoydb -c ""ALTER TABLE locations DROP CONSTRAINT IF EXISTS locations_user_id_fkey;""")
Bash(cmd.exe /c "echo SELECT 1; | set PGPASSWORD=GarantDockerPass && psql -h 10.21.61.51 -p 5432 -U postgres -d convoydb -t")
